page.title: 13FARMING (cont.)
page.content: {Hetton-le-Hill Farm's}400 acres are devoted to arable farming: winter barley (126 acres), wheat (96ac.),oats (42ac.),potatoes (23ac.),oil-seed rape (71ac.),fodder beet(30ac.). {Field House Farm's}180 acres are also arable: barley, wheat, oats and potatoes. {High Moorsley Farm}of 420 acres has 270 acres of cereals and 100 acres of oil-seed rape. Of their 45 acres of rough grassland, 21 acres form a site of Special Scientific Interest, with the farmer liaising with the Nature Conservancy Council and Tyne & Wear Countryside Management.This year 200 metres of new hedgerow has been planted. A small portion of{Rift Farm,}140 acres,is included in this area. It is a mixed farm of arable and a beef herd.
